```{r}
Del.zero <- function(vect){
  new.vect <- c()
  for (i in 1:length(vect)){
    if (vect[i] != 0){
      new.vect = append(new.vect, vect[i])
    }
  }
  return(new.vect)
}
```



Self-made Wilcoxon test

```{r}
Wilcox <- function(diff.data){
  t = 0
  #Q = 0
  diff.data = Del.zero(diff.data)
  rang.sign <- c(rep(1, length(diff.data)))
  for (i in 1:length(diff)){
    if (diff.data[i] < 0)
    {
      diff.data[i] = diff.data[i]*(-1)
      rang.sign[i] = -1
    }
  }
  rang.sign = rang.sign[order(diff.data)]
  diff.data = diff.data[order(diff.data)]
  S = 0
  for (i in 1:length(diff.data)){
    if (rang.sign[i] > 0)
    {
      S = S + i
    }
  } 
  N = length(diff.data)
  t = (S - N*(N+1)/4)/sqrt(N*(N+1)*(2*N+1)/24)
  #Z_T = (t - ET)/sqrt(DT)
  p = 2*pnorm(-abs(t))
  #Q = qnorm(0.975, mean = 0, sd = 1)
  return(p)
  
}
```


```{r}
df$dif = df$Y1 - df$Y2
diff <- c()
diff = df$dif
(W = Wilcox(diff))

```

Self-made MWW-test

```{r}
MWW <- function(data1, data2){
  data <- c(data1, data2)
  group <- factor(c(rep("A",length(data1)), rep("B",length(data2))), levels=c("A","B"))
  final_ranked <- rank(data)
  R <- tapply(final_ranked, group, sum)
  N <- length(data)
  # Expected R = n*(N+1)/2
  nA <- sum(group=="A")
  nB <- N - nA
  # if (nA <= nB){
  #   nl = nA
  # }
  # else{
  #   nl = nB
  # }
  Exp_R <- nA*nB/2
  # Standard error
  SE <- sqrt(nA*nB*(N+1)/12)
  # Z-score for group
  # if (nA <= nB){
  #   Rl = R["A"]
  # }
  # else{
  #   Rl = R["B"]
  # }
  UA = nA*nB + nA*(nA+1)/2 - R["A"]
  UB = nA*nB + nB*(nB+1)/2 - R["B"]
  Um = min(c(UA, UB))
  Z_A <- (Um - Exp_R)/SE
  pvalue = 2*pnorm(-abs(Z_A))
  return(pvalue)
}

```

```{r}
(P = MWW(x, y))
```

Hodgesâ€“Lehmann estimator
```{r}
HL <- function(data1, data2){
  hl <- c()
  i = 0
  j = 0
  for (i in 1:length(data1)){
    for (j in 1:length(data2)){
      hl = append(hl, data1[i] - data2[j])
    }
  }
  Teta = median(hl)
}
```

```{r}
(Hod.Leh = HL(x,y))
```

```{r}
CI <- function(data1, data2){
  z1 = qnorm(0.025)
  z2 = qnorm(0.975)
  data <- c(data1, data2)
  group <- factor(c(rep("A",length(data1)), rep("B",length(data2))), levels=c("A","B"))
  final_ranked <- rank(data)
  R <- tapply(final_ranked, group, sum)
  N <- length(data)
  # Expected R = n*(N+1)/2
  nA <- sum(group=="A")
  nB <- N - nA
  # if (nA <= nB){
  #   nl = nA
  # }
  # else{
  #   nl = nB
  # }
  # if (nA <= nB){
  #   Rl = R["A"]
  # }
  # else{
  #   Rl = R["B"]
  # }
  Exp_R <- nA*nB/2
  # Standard error
  SE <- sqrt(nA*nB*(N+1)/12)
  UA = nA*nB + nA*(nA+1)/2 - R["A"]
  UB = nA*nB + nB*(nB+1)/2 - R["B"]
  Um = min(UA, UB)
  U.calc = -z1*SE + Exp_R
  U.calc2 = nA*nB - U.calc
  U.calc = min(U.calc, U.calc2)
  #RL = (U.calc - Um)
  if (UA < UB){
    Rf = -1*U.calc + nA*nB + nA*(nA+1)/2
    delta = (Rf- R["A"])/nA
  }
  else{
    Rf = -1*U.calc + nA*nB + nB*(nB+1)/2
    delta = (Rf- R["B"])/nB
  }
  # R2 = -z2*SE + Exp_R
  # RR = (R2 - Rl)/nl
  # vect <- c(RL, RR)
  return(delta)
}

```
